content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_chest
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 53, "index": 10}, {"type": "purple_concrete", "quantity": 43, "index": 11}, {"type": "vex_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 12}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 38, "index": 14}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 8, "index": 15}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 46, "index": 30}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 31}, {"type": "armor_stand", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 53, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft an ender chest, I need to craft an ender eye. To craft an ender eye, I need to place 1 blaze powder, 1 ender pearl, and 1 fire charge in the crafting grid. I will first move the blaze powder from slot 22 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
